description:
A member of the http://anidb.net/ch25784 [Magicians Guild]; expert for teleportation.
The manga has her name as "Lufa Cheyenne", implying she is http://anidb.net/ch13449 [Rally]`s and http://anidb.net/ch25720 [Rosa]`s mother.
We can see Rally teleport herself in http://anidb.net/e18204 [episode 24] so she might have inherited this ability.
name: Lufa
